pages.title: Enchantments - General
pages.text: If you played FB Mods 5 you already know the maximum level of the enchatments if not i will explain. $(br)All minecraft enchatments can go to Level 50 (except Efficiency that goes to 77). FB Mods 6 also have new enchantments that i will explain latter.

pages.title: Enchantments - Desc.
pages.text: I will not describe all the enchatments in this for many reasons, first the book can't handle a lot of readable text per page, second there are already a mod that adds a description for the enchatments.

pages.title: Enchantments - Trades
pages.text: All of the new enchantments can be traded with villager and that increases the difficulty of getting the desired enchatment so i added easy villagers to help you get your enchatments. You can find on this book a page for Easy Vilagers and Easy Piglins.

pages.title: Enchantments - Related
pages.text: Go to this page to learn more.
